TopicTitle: Upgrading from 23.5 to .24.2, without the Contracts and Funds

Articles.Content:
I have an old game under 23.5. When I upgrade it to .24, it's automatically converted to a version with contracts, funds and Reputation. Yet the .24 version offers the option to create a new game, but without Contracts, you just get science points.

Is there anyway to upgrade my 23.5 save to .24, but to the version without Funds & etc?
